results.description: No Olympic title was more important to Brazil than the men's football - and Neymar and his team-mates delivered.
results.title: Rio Olympics 2016: 'Brazil's footballers exorcise demons to lift nation'

label: Olympic Football
Olympic Football; Football at the Summer Olympics (Classification)

results.description: Germany beat Nigeria 2-0 to reach the men's football final at the Rio 2016 Olympics and will face Brazil after the hosts thrashed Honduras 6-0.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Germany beat Nigeria to reach final
results.title: Rio Olympics 2016: Germany beat Nigeria to reach final

label: Olympic Football
Olympic Football; Football at the Summer Olympics (Classification)

results.description: Neymar and Gabriel Jesus each score twice as Brazil thrash Honduras 6-0 to advance to Saturday's gold-medal match in the men's football tournament.
results.shortTitle: Brazil thrash Honduras 6-0 to reach final
results.title: Rio Olympics 2016: Brazil thrash Honduras 6-0 to reach final

results.description: Brazil forward Neymar scores the quickest goal in Olympic history after just 14 seconds against Honduras in the men's semi-final at the Maracana in Rio.
results.shortTitle: Brazil's Neymar scores fastest Olympic goal
results.title: Rio Olympics 2016: Brazil's Neymar scores fastest goal in Olympic history

label: Olympic Football
Olympic Football; Football at the Summer Olympics (Classification)

results.description: Neymar scores his first goal of the Olympics as hosts Brazil beat Colombia 2-0 to reach the semi-finals of the men's football.
results.shortTitle: Neymar scores as Brazil reach semis
results.title: Rio Olympics 2016: Neymar scores as Brazil reach semi-finals

label: Olympic Football

results.description: Brazil respond to two 0-0 draws with a comprehensive 4-0 victory against Denmark to book their place into the quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Brazil put four past Denmark
results.title: Rio 2016 Olympics: Brazil demolish Denmark with an impressive display

results.description: Brazil experience a frustrating start to the Rio 2016 Olympic Games as they are held by 10-man South Africa in Brasilia.
